messages.message: Trying to create users for a sandbox and the customers (NWM) email service is stripping out the link from our reset password and confirm your email interactions.  Is there any way to create a user without email interaction in a sandbox?
Unfortunately, no. We could access the DB via grafana to get the verification token and construct the link. Or we can directly access the DB to manually set users as verified.
thanks - looks like we need to get the NWM email service to trust the Instabase emails to stop stripping links
yea, that'd be ideal. Users would likely need to use reset password feature many times down the road
